name: DESHOT - CODZOMBIELIKE
description:
This is my first game so please any constructive criticism is appreciated! :D

Nothing shown here is final.

Posting this here so I can have people test the very basic core features.

This game is inspired by The call of duty zombies franchise

There is no options menu yet sorry :(

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Aim

left ctrl - Crouch / Slide when sprinting into a crouch

Left Shift - Sprint

V - Melee

E - Interact

ESC - Pause

Perk Descriptions

Macho-Man - Grants 100 extra hp.

Too Young To Die! - On a hit that would have killed you, your health gets set to 1 and you release a "shockwave" That kills all zombies around you, Lose all perks when activated

Speed Demon - You can run quicker and reload quicker [Reloading quicker not yet implemented]
